title: Sony Semiconductor Rumored for a 180MP Medium Format Sensor
full_text:
Sony Semiconductor Rumored for a 180MP Medium Format Sensor. It seems the last little while all I have been talking about is megapixels. Over the last few days, rumors have surfaced from both the Fujifilm camp and now the Sony camp about Sony Semiconductor Solutions Group (SSSG) making a new 180MP medium-format sensor.….
When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
It seems the last little while all I have been talking abo… [+3805 chars]
